import React from 'react' import data from '../businesses.json' import { Form } from 'react-bootstrap' export default function BusinessList() { const fakeRedirect = (e) => { alert("fake redirect to external business") } const map = data.map((business) => { const tagMap = business.businessType.map((bus) => { return (
  • #{bus}
    • ) }) const featuredSpan = (business.promoted) ? Popular! : null const featuredClass = (business.promoted) ? "list side-card promoted" : "list side-card borderB" return (
  • {featuredSpan}
    {business.name}
    {business.score}/10   sustainability
      {tagMap}
    • Comment
    • Favorite
    • Photos
    • Socials
    • ) } ) return ( <>
      {map}
    ) }
